title: Hallmark 10" Elegant Card Receiving Box for Weddings, Graduations, Retirements, Birthdays (Pearl and Gold Dots)
description: Give the guests at your wedding reception, graduation party or retirement open house the perfect place to drop cards with this elegant pearl and gold card box. With a festive, ombre design of gold dots, it's sure to coordinate beautifully with the rest of your party decorations. Whether you're celebrating a graduation, engagement, wedding, retirement or birthday, this handy card holder will keep all your cards organized. Buy with Hallmark's thank you cards so you'll have stationery on hand to send a thoughtful note of appreciation to all your guests. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For more than 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.
